statements: UPDATE investments SET investment_amount = 500.00 WHERE investment_id = 1;
UPDATE investments SET investment_name = 'Stocks' WHERE investment_id = 2;
UPDATE investments SET investment_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE investment_id = 3;
UPDATE investments SET investment_amount = investment_amount + 500 WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
UPDATE investments SET investment_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE investment_name = 'Tech Inc';
UPDATE investments SET investment_amount = CASE WHEN investment_type = 'Bonds' THEN investment_amount * 1.1 ELSE investment_amount * 1.05 END;
UPDATE portfolio_investments SET purchase_price = 1500.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE portfolio_investments SET quantity = 100 WHERE investment_name = 'Stock A';
UPDATE investment_performance SET performance = 12.75 WHERE investment_id = 1 AND performance_date = '2022-05-10';
UPDATE portfolio_investments SET purchase_price = purchase_price * 1.1 WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE portfolio_investments SET quantity = quantity - 10, current_value = current_value - (purchase_price * 10) WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
UPDATE portfolio_investments pi JOIN investment_performance ip ON pi.id = ip.investment_id SET pi.current_value = pi.current_value + (pi.current_value * ip.performance);
UPDATE Investments SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InvestmentPerformance SET performance = performance * 1.05 WHERE investment_id = 2;
UPDATE Investors SET phone = '+1234567890' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Investments SET amount = amount + 1000 WHERE type = 'Stocks';
UPDATE InvestmentPerformance SET performance = performance * 1.05 WHERE date > '2023-01-01';
UPDATE Investors SET phone = '+1-202-555-1234' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE investments SET investment_amount = 1500 WHERE investment_name = 'Stocks'
UPDATE investors SET investor_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE investor_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE performance SET performance_value = 2500 WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-15'
UPDATE investments SET investment_amount = investment_amount * 1.1 WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
UPDATE investors SET investor_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE investor_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE performance SET performance_value = performance_value + 5000 WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE portfolio SET description = 'New description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE investment SET price = 150.75 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE performance SET return = 8.25 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE portfolio SET description = 'New description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE investment SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.05 WHERE portfolio_id = 1;
UPDATE performance SET start_value = 1500.00, end_value = 1800.00, return = (end_value - start_value) / start_value * 100 WHERE investment_id = 1;
